title: Covid-19 analysis with countries aggregated data
desc: Public PardusAI project analysing Covid-19 patterns in infection spread, mortality rates, and regional variations that shaped one of the most significant global health crises in modern history.

title: Bitcoin analysis (For educational purpose only)
desc: This analysis examines 5,612 daily price points spanning July 2010 to January 2026, revealing patterns of extreme volatility, multi-year market cycles, and remarkable long-term appreciation.
